sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { Line } from 'react-chartjs-2'; const WeatherItem = ({element, selectD: selectD }) => { const { data, options, city, country, image, weather, date, time, temp, tempMax, tempMin, tempFeel, pressure, wind, clouds, humidity, sunrise, sunset, aqi, color, pm2_5, error } = element; let content = null if(!error && city){ content = (

{city} {country}

{date} {time}

{weather}

{temp}°

odczuwalna {tempFeel}°

max:{tempMax}° min:{tempMin}°

{clouds}% {humidity}%

{pressure} hPa

{wind}km/h

{sunrise} {sunset}

Jakość powietrza:

{aqi}

({Math.floor((pm2_5/35)*100)}%)

) } return (
{error ?

Brak danych dla podanego maista - {city} nie istnieje lub zostało błędnie wpisane!

: content}
)}; const weatherIcons = { 1:'/images/clouds.png', 2:'/images/sunrise.png', 3:'/images/sunset.png', 4:'/images/humidity.png', 5:'/images/temp.webp', 6:'/images/pressure.png', 7:'/images/wind.png', }; const conditionColors = { 1:'green', 2:'lightgreen', 3:'yellow', 4:'red', 5:'purple', }; export default WeatherItem;
